query:
ALTER TABLE products 
ADD COLUMN lifecycle_state ENUM('concept', 'development', 'pre_launch', 'active_launch', 'post_launch', 'cruise', 'end_of_life') DEFAULT 'concept' AFTER isActive,
ADD COLUMN intelligence_metadata JSON AFTER lifecycle_state,
ADD COLUMN variant_summary JSON AFTER intelligence_metadata,
ADD COLUMN last_intelligence_update TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER variant_summary
